name: Starfall (gothicserpent)
description:
In a space environment, you must fly a sophisticated combat ship and fight the enemies through aerial battles. You'll fight hordes of enemies, destroy their ships, collect powerups for your ship so you can upgrade your ship.

At the end of a level, you'll face off against a more powerful version of the normal enemies. You must be on your wits end to face off against these powerful boss enemies. The expanding difficulty will require a sharp will to survive. Are you up for this task?

This is a game that I made for fun, and I hope you enjoy the game. If you have feedback for the community behind the game, please join my discord or send me a message on twitter or youtube!

If you have any comments please be constructive and I will be happy to look into any issues and fix them as they are mentioned, since I'm at my desk all day and develop this stuff for a living.

Discord - https://discord.gg/RquMAxPyT2

YouTube - https://www.youtube.com/koshdogg

Twitter - https://twitter.com/xinroch

Gothic Serpent Company Site - https://www.gothicserpent.com
